item.title: Coding Challenge: Coin Dispense System
item.author: dpweberza@gmail.com (David Weber)
item.description: Preamble I have started cleaning up and updating my Github account https://github.com/dpweberza as more and more companies these days are likely to view it. The Coding Challenge In 2015 I interviewed at a global mobile payments company for the position of Android Developer. At the time I had no commericial Android development experience but nevertheless was invited to complete a coding challenge after I had passed a screening call.
